text: The year 2009 is the 2nd year in the history of Jewels, a mixed martial arts promotion based in Japan. In 2009 Jewels held 6 events beginning with, Jewels 2nd Ring. ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! scope="col" | Event Title ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Attendance |- | align=center| 8 | Jewels 6th Ring | | Shinjuku Face | Tokyo, Japan | 762 |- | align=center| 7 | Jewels 5th Ring | | Shinjuku Face | Tokyo, Japan | 610 |- | align=center| 5 | Jewels 4th Ring | | Shin-Kiba 1st Ring | Tokyo, Japan | 464 |- | align=center| 4 | Jewels 3rd Ring | | Shinjuku Face | Tokyo, Japan | 734 |- | align=center| 3 | Jewels: Rough Stone: First Ring | | Isami Wrestle Budokan | Wairabi, Saitama, Japan | |- | align=center| 2 | Jewels 2nd Ring | | Shinjuku Face | Tokyo, Japan | 588 |} ==Jewels 2nd Ring== Jewels 2nd Ring was an event held on February 4, 2009 at Shinjuku Face in Tokyo, Japan. ===Results=== ==Jewels: Rough Stone: First Ring== Jewels: Rough Stone: First Ring was an event held on April 19, 2009 at the Isami Wrestle Budokan in Wairabi, Saitama, Japan. ===Results=== ==Jewels 3rd Ring== Jewels 3rd Ring was an event held on May 16, 2009 at Shinjuku Face in Tokyo, Japan. ===Results=== ==Jewels 4th Ring== Jewels 4th Ring was an event held on July 11, 2009 at Shin-Kiba 1st Ring in Tokyo, Japan. ===Results=== ==Jewels 5th Ring== Jewels 5th Ring was an event held on September 13, 2009 at Shinjuku Face in Tokyo, Japan. ===Results=== ==Jewels 6th Ring== Jewels 6th Ring was an event held on December 11, 2009 at Shinjuku Face in Tokyo, Japan. ===Results=== == See also == * Jewels ==References== Category:Jewels (mixed martial arts) events Category:2009 in mixed martial arts
title: 2009 in Jewels
